news.title: Tadhg (4) died in firebomb as he was babysat by grandaunt as gardaí hunt gang behind 'reckless, callous' attack
news.summary: Gardaí have issued a nationwide alert for all units to be on the lookout for a getaway vehicle used by a gang that firebombed an innocent family’s home, killing a four-year-old boy and his grandaunt.

news.title: Storm Bram: Met Éireann issues Status Orange wind warnings for eleven counties
news.summary: Ireland is bracing for heavy winds and rain tonight as Storm Bram hits the country. Met Éireann has issued a Status Yellow wind warning for the whole country and a Status Orange wind warning for eleven counties.

news.title: Double murderer Ruth Lawrence used email address ‘ruthofallevil’ as she receives two life sentences
news.summary: Ruth Lawrence, who a court heard found it funny that she murdered a man who said he would die for his friend, has been asked by the victim's family whether she is "laughing now" after being handed two life sentences.

news.title: Judge commends ‘bravery’ of Willow Park abuse survivors who ‘bared their souls’ as ex-teacher is jailed
news.summary: A former school teacher has been jailed for 10 years for the indecent assault of eight boys over 30 years ago at a private Dublin school.

news.title: Serial rapist branded ‘danger to society’ as he’s jailed for ‘campaign of abuse’ against half brother and two girls he babysat
news.summary: A “most dangerous sexual predator” has been jailed for 15 years for the repeated rape and sexual abuse of his younger brother and two young girls 30 years ago.

news.title: Mo Salah dropped from Liverpool squad for Champions League clash with Inter Milan
news.summary: Mohamed Salah has been dropped from Liverpool’s Champions League squad travelling to Milan following his explosive comments about his relationship with head coach Arne Slot, his treatment by the club and his future.

news.title: Flu surge risks ruining Christmas for families, with up to 1,500 hospitalised as new stain spreads rapidly
news.summary: Ireland is being battered by flu wave and it could get worse, peaking over Christmas and ruining festivities for many who will be laid low.

news.title: Michael Houghton: ‘For many years, I carried a quiet guilt about being a landlord. Now my attitude has started to shift’
news.summary: No matter what new rental law the Government introduces, private landlords continue to sell up in droves. The latest figures from Sherry FitzGerald show that for every three landlords who sell, only one new landlord is entering the market.

news.title: ‘It was super special’ – swimmer Ellen Walshe on making history as first Irish woman to win European Short Course title
news.summary: There was a warm welcome for the Irish swimming team at Dublin Airport today as they arrived home from Poland with their haul of seven medals.

news.title: Golden Globes 2026 nominations: Jessie Buckley, Paul Mescal and Maggie O’Farrell receive nods for Hamnet
news.summary: The nominations for the 2026 Golden Globes were announced at lunchtime today, kicking off this year’s awards season in earnest.
